title: Adobe Photoshop CC 2015 Portable FULL
description:
Adobe Photoshop CC 2015 Portable FULL


Adobe Photoshop CC complete solution for professional processing of digital images, which contains the most advanced tools to work with images and new opportunities for creative ideas that can significantly improve performance.

Edit images with exceptional accuracy, use a new intuitive tools and workflows for creating three-dimensional graphics, two-dimensional projects, as well as movies.

Benefits of Adobe Photoshop CC

Improvements to smart objects
Save links to external files by automatically packaging them in a single directory. Can also convert your existing embedded smart objects to linked smart objects.

Improved layer comps
Save time at work with layers, because now you can change the visibility, position, or display one layer, and then distribute the changes to all other layers in the composition. In addition, you can view the attributes of each composition layers and switch between songs layers in the smart object.

Filters motion blur
Use blur effect loop to add blur along any contour, as well as blur effect when rotating to create a circular or elliptical blur. Mechanism Mercury Playback Engine allows you to use all filters blur even faster.

Mask areas of focus
Let Photoshop help you start a mask by automatically selecting the focus areas in the image. This feature is great for portraits and other images with low depth of field, and the mechanism Mercury Graphics Engine provides fast processing of such images.

Improved technology for content-aware
New technology implemented in the tools "Fill content-aware," "Moving content-aware" and "Patch based content", gently mix the field gradient fill (eg, sky), so you can achieve the most organic and realistic results.

More efficient "fast" guides
Forget having to align multiple shapes or objects at exact distances from each other on the workspace. Now the distance between objects can be viewed in pixels, for more precise placement of content.

Fonts for desktop computers in the library Typekit
Select the desired fonts in the library Typekit, synchronize them with your desktop computer and immediately start to work with them from the font menu in Photoshop. Photoshop will even automatically replace missing fonts in your documents.

Search of fonts
Perform search fonts by name and instantly browse your favorite.

Advanced features three-dimensional printing
Now you can see exactly what places and how Photoshop corrected 3D-mesh, which facilitates the adjustment of the project applications in 3D-modeling of third-party suppliers. Achieve more accurate renderings of your models prior to printing with precise display of the preview (WYSIWYG). Use the support of a larger number of three-dimensional printers and service providers such seal.

Improvements in technology Adobe Generator
Simplify the process of naming a work content Generator and flexibly organize the output by specifying default values that apply to the entire document, and the ability to specify subfolders for exported materials. Generator also offers new APIs so developers can create even more powerful plug-ins.

Improvements in Adobe Camera Raw 8
Thanks to improvements in this module improved accuracy of image restoration, eliminate perspective distortion and create vignettes. In addition, access an interactive histogram, previews material before and after the changes, as well as to many others.

Improved support for working with pen in Windows 8.1
Enjoy the opportunity to work quickly and comfortably with your stylus on Windows 8.1 devices, and enjoy smoother brush strokes thanks to higher-frequency sampling.

Extended support mechanism Mercury Graphics Engine
Upsample images up to 15 times faster (depending on file size and video card configuration), as a mechanism Mercury Graphics Engine now delivers an OpenCL performance boost. The mechanism is used to handle new filters motion blur, as well as the function of the mask areas of focus.

Experimental features
New customization options allow you to evaluate the new features of Photoshop and help in their development before they will be formally implemented in the product.

Intelligent upsampling, even faster
Increase the image is low resolution for use in print, or start with a larger image to the size of a Billboard or a Billboard. The zoom function allows you to save the level of detail and sharpness of the image and eliminate noise, and now thanks to the OpenCL performance boost due to the use of Mercury Graphics Engine you can see the results instantly.

Improved workflows
Improved the application's features allow you to increase the speed and convenience of work. Now you have access to the expanded color bar and the list of recently used brushes, functions, settings sync working environment and shortcuts, and the ability to customize the menu using the function "Sync settings" etc.

And much more
Also contains support for very large files PNG; tables color coding 3D; new video formats including Sony RAW and Canon RAW, and much more.

Version features:
Portable version of the software that does not require installation.
Combined distribution 32/64-bit with selectable bit depth.
Treatment was performed.
Camera Raw v.9.1.0.441
To run with administrator rights!
